SA15n1233:667: evaṃ manyate-yathā bhinnā api vyaktayaḥ kayācit pratyāsattyā tadekakāryapratiniyamalakṣaṇayā tadekamabhinnaṃ sāmānyamupakurvvanti,
SA15n1233:672: tathā hi-anumānādike jñāne yathāvidhamasyāspaṣṭaṃ rūpaṃ pratibhāsate na tathāvidhaṃ vyaktiṣu dṛśyamānāsupalakṣayāmaḥ |
SA15n1233:673: ekameva hi vyaktidarśanakāle spaṣṭaṃ nīlādirūpaṃ vibhāvayāmaḥ |
SA15n1233:678: na ca sāmānyasya dve rūpe staḥ spaṣṭamaspaṣṭaṃ ca,
SA15n1233:686: jāyate dvayātmakatvena vinā sā ca na yujyate ||”
SA15n1233:700: iti | ekatrāpi ca vyaktāvupalabhyamānāyāṃ sakalatrailokyavyāpi rūpaṃ sakalasvāśrayavyāpi vā dṛśyeta ? |
SA15n1233:701: na hyekasyāḥ kiñcid dṛṣṭamadṛṣṭaṃ vā nāma kṣaṇikatādivad |
SA15n1233:702: dṛṣṭāyāmapyekatraivāśraye darśanāvasāyo na sarvvatreti cet; na,
SA15n1233:704: na hi niścayaviṣayīkṛtaṃ cāniścitaṃ ceti yuktam |
SA15n1233:706: na hi taddarśane tatsahacāriṇa upalabhyasya tadabhinnasvabhāvasya cānupalambho yuktaḥ |
SA15n1233:710: na hi tāsu sāmānyagrāhiṇīṣvaspaṣṭo vyaktyākāra iva lakṣyamāṇaḥ svalakṣaṇapratibhāsaḥ |
SA15n1233:714: tasmānneyaṃ bhinnārthagrāhiṇyabhinnā sāmānyabuddhiḥ pratibhāti svalakṣaṇobhdavā satī |
SA15n1233:720: vistaratastu syāvdādabhaṅgād yathāvasaramihaiva tatra tatra vidhāsyamānād bādhakamavadhāryam |
SA15n1233:721: tasmād yathā vyaktayaḥ sāmānyāntaramantareṇa tadekamupakurvvanti tathā'bhinnajñānābhidhāne api pravartayiṣyantīti tadeva nīlasvalakṣaṇaṃ sāmānyasādhyatvopagatārthakriyākāri |
SA15n1233:731: tā hi tena vinotpannā mithyā syurvviṣayādṛte |
SA15n1233:732: na tvanyena vinā vṛttiḥ sāmānyasyeha duṣyati ||”
SA15n1233:733: iti mithyātvaprasaṅgadoṣa ukto nāsau tathāgatasamayanayāvadātabuddhīn bādhate |
SA15n1233:747: prāgāsīnna ca taddeśe sā tayā saṅgatā katham ? ||
SA15n1233:748: vyaktināśe na cennaṣṭā gatā vyaktyantaraṃ na ca |
SA15n1233:749: tacchūnye na sthitā deśe sā jātiḥ kveti kathyatām ||
SA15n1233:753: yadi nīlasvalakṣaṇameva sāmānyasādhyārthakriyākāri tadeva tarhyadhigacchan vikalpaḥ pramāṇaṃ bhaviṣyatītyāha-“tacca” nīlakhalakṣaṇam |
SA15n1233:755: tato niṣpāditakriye karmmaṇyaviṣeṣādhāyi vikalpajñānaṃ kathaṃ pramāṇaṃ syāt ? |
SA15n1233:756: atha matam- sāmānyameva tarhyadhigacchan nīlavikalpaḥ pramāṇamastu |
SA15n1233:758: yato nīlasādhyāmevārthakriyāṃ nīlena saha sambhūya kariṣyati |
SA15n1233:759: vyaktisvabhāvānyeva hi sāmānyānītyāha- “na ca” naiva “tat svalakṣaṇagrahaṇottarakālabhāvino” nīlavyaktidarśanottarakālaṃ bhavanaśīlasya |
SA15n1233:760: liṅgagrahaṇottarakālabhāvinastu pūrvvoktena prakāreṇa vyaktisādhyārthakriyā sāmānyasya kalpitasya vyavasthāpayituṃ śakyata iti bhāvaḥ |
SA15n1233:763: na ca nityasvabhāvatāmābibhrāṇena nīlavikalpasya viṣayeṇa nīlasādhyā'nyā vā'rthakriyā kriyate |
SA15n1233:766: tadevaṃ ‘nīlaṃ dṛṣṭvā nīlam’ iti jñāne pratibhasamānaṃ sāmānyaṃ na kāñcidarthakriyāmupakalpayatīti prasādhya anarthakriyākāriviṣayasyāpi vikalpasya pratyakṣapṛṣṭhabhāvinaḥ prāmāṇyaprasaṅgādativyāptiriti “tatrāpūrvārthavijñānam” iti pramāṇalakṣaṇe mīmāṃsakairvviśeṣaṇamupādeyamiti darśayannāha-“tasmād” yata evamanarthakriyāsādhanaviṣayatayā darśanapṛṣṭhabhāvino vikalpasya prāmāṇyamayuktam tasmādasmadabhimataṃ “pramāṇamavisaṃvādi jñānam” iti pramāṇalakṣaṇaṃ vyudasya “anadhigatārthaviṣayaṃ pramāṇam”,
SA15n1233:770: anena hi viśeṣaṇenānumānavikalpasya ca prāmāṇyaṃ sidhyati,
SA15n1233:771: ālocanājñānapṛṣṭhabhāvinaśca vikalpasya prāmāṇyaṃ vyudasyata iti sarvvaṃ sustham |
SA15n1233:772: tadevaṃ vidhivikalpasyānarthakriyāsādhanaviṣayatayā'nadhigatasāmānyadhigame'pi prāmāṇyaṃ nirākṛtya caśabdasamuccitaṃ smṛtitvaṃ pratiṣedhavikalpena sādhāraṇamaprāmāṇyakāraṇaṃ darśayannāha-“adhigate tu svalakṣaṇe” ālocanājñānena “tatsāmarthyajanmā” svalakṣaṇādhigamabalabhāvī “vikalpastadanukārī” sākṣādanutpatterddarśanasaṃskārādheyavaśaccāspa(cca spa)
SA15n1233:779: yataśca kāryataḥ tadviṣayatvāt smṛtirevāto “na pramāṇam” darśanabalotpanno vikalpaḥ |
SA15n1233:783: tacca vidhivikalpe'pi samānamiti kathamasau smṛtirnna syāditi |
SA15n1233:786: tathā hi-yadevānagnivyāvṛttaṃ vastumātraṃ mahānasādāvanubhūtamāsīt tadeva pradeśaviśeṣe dhūmadarśanāt smaryate |
SA15n1233:788: evammanyate-yat mahānasādāvanagnivyāvṛttaṃ vastumātraṃ prāganubhūtaṃ na tat taddeśādisambandhitayaivānumānavikalpena smaryate kintu yatra pradeśe prāgananubhūtaṃ tatsambandhitayā |
SA15n1233:795: pramāṇaṃ tu kasmānna bhavatīti ced āha-“vastvadhiṣṭhānatvāt” ityādi |
SA15n1233:798: yadi vastvadhiṣṭhānā pramāṇavyavasthā kathaṃ viprakṛṣṭaviṣayāyā anupalabdheḥ prāmāṇyam iti cet;
SA15n1233:799: tatrāpi pradhānādivikalpasyaiva bhāvānupādānatayā sādhyatvāt tasyā api vastvadhiṣṭhānatā'styevetyadoṣaḥ |
SA15n1233:801: ityāha-“arthakriyāyāṃ” sukhaduḥkhalakṣaṇāyāṃ yad “yogyaṃ” śaktaṃ “tadviṣayatvāt tadarthinām” arthakriyārthināṃ “pravṛtteḥ” prāptityāgalakṣaṇāyāḥ |
SA15n1233:802: yadi nāmarthakriyāyogye tadarthināṃ pravṛttistathāpi kathaṃ vastvadhiṣṭhānā pramāṇavyavasthā ?
SA15n1233:803: , arthakriyāyogyādhiṣṭhānā hi tathā sati syāt iti cet;
SA15n1233:805: tato'rthakriyāyogyādhiṣṭhānatvena vastvadhiṣṭhānatvaṃ kathaṃ na syāt iti bhāvaḥ |
SA15n1233:806: idaṃ ca vastvāśrayeṇa pramāṇavyavasthāpratipādanamanadhigate svalakṣaṇa ityukte kadācit paro brūyāt-vastumātranibandhanā hi pramāṇavyavasthā na svalakṣaṇāśrayaiva |
SA15n1233:807: tato yadyapyanadhigataṃ svalakṣaṇaṃ nādhigacchati tathāpyanadhigatavasturūpamadhigacchato vikalpasya prāmāṇyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti tadasiddhatobhdāvanārthamuktam- “anadhigatavasturūpe”tyādi |
SA15n1233:810: tathā ca vastuviṣayamapi prāmāṇyaṃ bruvatā svalakṣaṇaviṣayamevoktaṃ bhavati,
SA15n1233:813: punarapyanubhavottarakālabhāvino nīlavikalpasya prāmāṇyamapanetumupacayahetumāha-“tato'pi” yathoktād vikalpād na kevalaṃ nīlasvalakṣaṇānubhavād “vastunyeva” svalakṣaṇa eva “tadadhyavasāyena” svalakṣaṇādhyavasāyena anyathā tatra pravṛttyayogāt “puruṣasya pravṛtte” adhigate svalakṣaṇe tatsāmarthyajanmā vikalpo na pramāṇamiti sambandhaḥ |
SA15n1233:818: yadi nāma tadadhyavasāyena vastunyeva puruṣasya pravṛttistathāpyanadhigatasāmānyagrāhiṇo'sya darśanāt pṛthak prāmāṇyaṃ kimiti neṣyate?
SA15n1233:819: iti cet; āha-“pravṛttau” svalakṣaṇa eva satyāṃ “pratyakṣeṇa” ālocanājñānākhyena “abhinnayogakṣematvāt” |
SA15n1233:824: abhinnaḥ kṣema ālocanāvijñānādiva vikalpādapi svalakṣaṇa eva pravṛtteḥ |
SA15n1233:825: ayamasyābhiprāyaḥ-yadi vikalpo nirvikalpacetasaḥ prameyāntaraviṣayastadā tatraiva puruṣaṃ pravartayatu tatsādhyāmarthakriyāmadhigantum |
SA15n1233:827: tadviṣayatvābhimatasya sāmānyasyābhinnajñānalakṣaṇāyā evārthakriyāyā upagamād vikalpodayādeva ca tatsiddheḥ |
SA15n1233:828: nahi nīlānubhavāt prameyāntaraviṣayāḥ pītādipratyayāḥ puruṣaṃ nīlavastuni pravartayanti,
SA15n1233:834: iti | tato nīladarśanasyaiva nirvikalpasya prāmāṇyaṃ yuktam,
SA15n1233:835: na tadabhinnopayogasya smṛteriva vikalpasyāpi darśanāt pṛthageva |
SA15n1233:836: anyathā niṣphalāṃ pramāṇāntarakalpanāṃ kurvvataḥ smṛticchādveṣaprayatnādi pramāṇamanuṣajyata iti pramāṇānāmiyattā viśīryeteti |
SA15n1233:839: na caivam, ato'nekānta iti pramāṇasaṃplavavādī darśayannāha-“pūrvvapratyakṣakṣaṇena” ityādi |
SA15n1233:849: yadā kṣaṇaviśeṣasādhye'rthe hitāhitalakṣaṇe vāñchā prāptiparihārecchā yogināṃ paropakāramuddiśya bhavati kasyacit kathañcit kvacidupayogāt tadā |
SA15n1233:850: yathā darśanamārgge duḥkhe dharmmajñānakṣāntirddamānāmanuśayānāṃ vāsanāṃ nirodhayati,
SA15n1233:854: tat eṣāṃ grāhakāṇi paracittajñānāni pṛthageva pramāṇāni |
SA15n1233:855: parahitādhānadīkṣāvatāṃ ca samastavastuvistaravyāpijñānālokāvabhāsitāntarātmanāṃ bhagavatāṃ kaścidevārthakṣaṇaḥ kasyacideva parārthasyānugrāhako biabandhako veti sarvvabhāvān pratikṣaṇaṃ vīkṣamāṇānāmadhyakṣacetasāṃ tadviṣayakṣaṇānāṃ bhinnārthakriyāsūpayogato nānāyogakṣematvāt |
SA15n1233:856: tad yadi pratikṣaṇaṃ kṣaṇavivekadarśino'dhikṛtyocyate tadā bhinnopayogitayā pṛthak prāmāṇyāt nānekāntaḥ |
SA15n1233:857: atha sarvvapadārtheṣvekatvā'dhyavasāyinaḥ sāṃvyavahārikān puruṣānabhipretyocyate tadā sakalameva nīlasantānamekamarthaṃ sthirarūpaṃ tatsādhyāṃ cārthakriyāmekātmikāmadhyavasyantīti prāmāṇyamapyuttareṣāmaniṣṭameveti kuto'nekāntaḥ ?
SA15n1233:859: tatsantānavarttināṃ sarvvakṣaṇānāmekatvenādhyavasitānāṃ vyavahartṛbhiryat sādhāraṇaṃ pratikṣaṇamanyānyakāraṇatayā vibhinnamapi paramārthato viparyāsādekatāyā'bhiniviṣṭaṃ rañjanādikaṃ nīlādikakārtyaṃ tatra “na teṣām” uktareṣāṃ jñānakṣaṇānāṃ “sāmarthya” syārthaprāpaṇaśakte“rbhedaḥ” |
SA15n1233:860: pūrvvapratyakṣakṣaṇaviṣaya eva tebhyo'pi pravṛtterādyasyaiva tatra prāmāṇyam |
SA15n1233:861: tathā hi-arthakriyārthināṃ tatsādhanaprāpaṇasamarthe jñāne pramāṇavyavahāraṃ kurvvatāmaviklavadhiyāmarthakriyāsādhanabhedādeva prāmāṇyabhedavyavahāro jñāneṣu yuktaḥ anyathā smṛtyāderapi prāmāṇyaprasaṅgaḥ kathamapākriyeta ?
SA15n1233:862: , ādriyeta vā niṣphalā pramāṇavyavasthā prekṣāvatā iti ? |
SA15n1233:864: ityāha- “aparāpare” ca te “dhūmā”śca taiḥ “pramitā”śca te “sannikṛṣṭāgraya”śca teṣviva tadviṣayāṇamiva “anumānajñānāmagnimātrasādhye'rthe” sandhukṣaṇādike vāñchite tadarthakriyāsādhanaprāpaṇavyaktibhedābhāvāt yathā prāmāṇyabhedo na yukto viduṣāṃ tathā'trāpi |
SA15n1233:865: yadā tu pañcatapastaptukāmo bhavati tadā'parāparadhūmapramitasannikṛṣṭāgniviṣayāṇāmapyanumānānāṃ sāmarthyabhedāt prāmāṇyamanivāritameva |
SA15n1233:868: ’ ityudāharaṇe nīlavikalpasya prāmāṇyaṃ nirākṛtya prakṛte yojayannāha- “etena” nīlasvalakṣaṇadarśanottarakālabhāvino nīlavikalpasya prāmāṇyanirākaraṇena |
SA15n1233:878: pūrvvakameva svalakṣaṇaviṣayaṃ darśanaṃ yat pareṇālocanājñānamiti vyavahṛta tat pramāṇaṃ na tu tadvalabhāvī vikalpo yathoktena nyāyeneti sthitametat-“pakṣadharmmasya sādhyadharmmiṇi pratyakṣato'numānato vā prasiddhiḥ” niścaya iti |
SA15n1233:879: tadevaṃ pratyakṣataḥ pakṣadharmmaniścayaṃ bruvatā prasaṅgena darśanapṛṣṭhabhāvino vikalpasya prāmāṇyanirākaraṇāt
SA15n1233:883: yadyevaṃ kasmad “anumānavyutpādanārthamidamārabhyate” ityuktam na sāmānyena ‘samyagjñānavyutpādanārtham’ iti ? |
SA15n1233:886: kasmād ? yataḥ pakṣadharmma eva tadaṃśena vyāpta eva ca hetuḥ kāraṇaṃ tasyāḥ,
SA15n1233:887: nānya ityabhidhānāt parokṣārthaviṣayaṃ sarvvaṃ pramāṇamanumāne'ntarbhāvitamiti saṅkṣepataḥ saṅkhayāvipratipattiḥ samyagjñānaviṣayā nirastā |
SA15n1233:888: tathā, vyāpakāṃśasya gamyatvapratīteḥ tadaṃśavyāptivacanena sāmānyaviṣayamanumānaṃ na svalakṣaṇaviṣayamityākhyātam tasyāsādhāraṇatvāt,
SA15n1233:894: tathā, tasya dvidhā prayoga iti vakṣyamāṇatvāt parārthānumānaṃ kathayiṣyate,
SA15n1233:899: tatā hi-pradhānapuruṣārthopayoginastattvasya caturāryasatyalakṣaṇasyānumānata eva niścayāt tasya prādhānyam |
SA15n1233:904: anubhūyamānaphalaṃ vā dṛśyamānaṃ tatpravṛttiviṣayo nispannatvāt phalasya |
SA15n1233:905: tasmād yadanāgataphalaṃ sukhaduḥkhasādhanaṃ pratyakṣamapi tatrāpyanumānameva pravartakam |
SA15n1233:906: na hi tasyānāgate sukhaduḥkhe prati yogyatāṃ pratyakṣaṃ nirddhārayati,
SA15n1233:908: taduktam-“ na hyapratyakṣe kārye kāraṇabhāvagatiḥ” iti |
SA15n1233:909: tasmāt pūrvvānubhūtasukhaduḥkhasādhanasādharmyāt pratyakṣaviṣayasyāpi vastuno'nāgataphalayogyatāniścayaḥ na pratyakṣataḥ |
SA15n1233:914: phalamanāgataṃ prati yogyatāyā anumānata ityubhayorapi pravartakatvam |
SA15n1233:915: samyagjñānapūrvvakatvaṃ ca hitāhitaprāptiparihārayoraktam na tvanāgataphalaṃ prati yogyatāyāḥ pratyakṣato'niścayāt |
SA15n1233:919: tatra svabhāvakāryānupalambhānāṃ pakṣadharmmaniścayastulyopāyasādhyatayā'bhedenaivoktaḥ anvayavyatirekaniścayasya tu bhinnopāyasādhyatayā bhedenaiva nirddeśaḥ kārya iti svabhāvahetau tāvadanvayaniścayaṃ svapramāṇanibandhanaṃ darśayannāha-“anvayaniścayo'pi” na kevalaṃ pakṣadharmmaniścaya uktaḥ kintvanvayaniścayo'pi “svabhāvahetau” ucyata iti śeṣaḥ |
SA15n1233:920: “sādhanadharmma” sya yad “bhāvamātraṃ” sattāmātraṃ mugdarādinimittantarānapekṣaṃ tasya “anubandho” anugamanaṃ vyāptiḥ tasya “siddhiḥ” yā sa svabhāvahetāvanvayaniścayaḥ |
SA15n1233:923: yatra yatra sādhanadharmmasya bhāvaḥ tatra tatra sādhyadharmmasyāpi nimittāntarānapekṣo bhava ityetasyārthasya siddhiḥ svabhāvahetāvanvayaniścayaḥ |
SA15n1233:925: ? “tabhdāvatayā” sa sādhanadharmo bhāvaḥ-svabhāvo yasya tasya bhāvatayā tabhdāvatayā |
SA15n1233:926: yo hi sādhanadharmmaḥ sādhyadharmmasya svabhāvaḥ sa kathaṃ taṃ nānubadhnīyāt,
SA15n1233:931: sādhyasādhanasaṃkalpakāle tu paramparayā tattadvayāvṛttapadārthanibandhanāyāṃ kalpanābuddhau bhedena pratibhāsanāt sādhyasādhanabhāvo na vihanyate |
SA15n1233:932: na hyasau pāramārthikaṃ sādhyasādhanadharmmayorddharmiṇaśca kṛtakatvādau bhedamavalambate,
SA15n1233:934: ekārthasamavāyaḥ kṛtakatvānityatvādeḥ sambandhaḥ iti cet; na,
SA15n1233:935: tasyāpi tato'rthāntaratve ‘ayamanayorasminnarthe samavāyaḥ’ iti sambandhābhāvasya tadavasthatvāt,
SA15n1233:937: samavāyād vṛttikalpanāyāṃ ca kṛtakatvādayo nityābhimateṣvapyātmādiṣu varteran |
SA15n1233:938: ya eva hi kṛtakatvādeḥ śabde samavāyo yabdalāt tatraiva tad vartate sa eva nityābhimateṣvapi,
SA15n1233:939: tasyaikatvenopagatatvāt ityātmādau vṛttiḥ kṛtakatvādeḥ kena nivāryeta ? |
SA15n1233:940: atha ‘ya evābhūtvā bhavanadharmmā bhūtvā cābhavanadharmmā'sthirarūpo bhāvaḥ tatraiva kṛtakatvādayo dharmmā vartante ’ iti vyavasthāpyate |
SA15n1233:941: saiva tarhyabhūtvā bhavanasvabhāvatā bhūtasya cāsthirasvabhāvatā tadviparītarūpasamāropavyavacchedaviṣayāyāḥ kalpanābuddhernibandhanaṃ kiṃ neṣyate ? |
SA15n1233:942: tayaiva paramārthābhedavatorddharmmayoḥ sādhyadharmmiṇi vṛtteḥ kimantarālagaḍunā kṛtakatvādinā vyatirekavatā upagatena ? |
SA15n1233:943: tathā hi-na sattāmātreṇa kṛtakatvādayo dharmmāḥ sādhyadharmmapratipattinibandhanam,
SA15n1233:946: sa ca vikalpaḥ svapratibhāsinamevakāraṃ bahīrūpatayā'dhyavasitamanusaran kṛtakānityādirūpatāṃ vastunaḥ pratipadyate,
SA15n1233:950: tad varaṃ yadeva tatkalpanānnibandhanaṃ tadeva tathāvidhavikalpaprasavanimittamastu,
SA15n1233:952: tadabhyupagame ca caritārthā vyatirekavanto dharmmā ityalaṃ tatkalpanayā |
SA15n1233:953: avaśyaṃ ca vyatiriktā'nityatādvāreṇāpi vastuna evānavasthāyinamātmānaṃ pratipadyate,
SA15n1233:956: anyathā vyatiriktā'nityatayā nityatvāt tadavagamārthitvenāyamanityasādhyārthakriyārthī nityaṃ śabdādikamāśaṅkamānaḥ kimanityatāvicāraṃ prati āhītāsthaḥ ? |
SA15n1233:964: ye'pi jaiminīyā manyante- ‘yeṣāmatyantavyatirekavanto dharmmāḥ teṣāmevāyaṃ naiyāyikādīnāṃ doṣaḥ,
SA15n1233:965: asmākaṃ tu kathañcid bhedābhedavatāṃ dharmmāṇāṃ tatsvabhāvatayā naiṣa doṣaḥ’ iti;
SA15n1233:971: tato'pi tayoḥ kathañcid bhedābhedau sta eveti cet; na,
SA15n1233:973: tathā hi-dharmmayostadekasvabhāvādapi bhedavatostena svabhāvena kathañcidabhedanimittamabhinno'paraḥ svabhāvo'bhyupagantavyaḥ,
SA15n1233:975: na ca kalpanābuddhāvanantobhayarūpasvabhāvaparamparā pratibhāsata iti kimiti tatkalpanayā''tmānaṃ vipralabhante bhavantaḥ ? |
SA15n1233:976: kathañcit ca bhedopagamāt kathaṃ bhedapakṣabhāvināṃ doṣāṇāmanavasaraḥ ? |
SA15n1233:978: ayaṃ dharmmī’ iti vyavasthāpyate yadi tena bhedastadā bheda eveti kuto'nekāntavādaḥ ? |
SA15n1233:982: dharmmī cāyam’ iti kathaṃ pāramārthikaṃ tṛ(tri)
SA15n1233:984: tasmāt tattatpararūpavyāvṛttisamāśrayāyāṃ kalpanābuddhau bhedavatāmiva dharmmadharmmiṇāṃ pratibhāsanāt sādhyasādhanabhāvaḥ |
SA15n1233:985: tanmātrānubandhastu vastutaḥ tattatsvabhāvatayaiva yuktaḥ iti manyamānena “vastutastabhdāvatayā” ityuktam |
SA15n1233:987: kā punarasau vastutastabhdāvatā yayā hetubhūtayā sādhyadharmmasya sādhanadharmmabhāvamātrānubandhaḥ sidhyati ?
SA15n1233:992: tasya yā “vṛtti” pravṛttiḥ “bādhakapramāṇavṛttiḥ” tatsādhyatvācca vastutastabhdāvatāyāḥ sā bādhakapramāṇavṛttiruktā |
SA15n1233:993: tasyāṃ hi satyāṃ vipakṣāt nivṛtto hetuḥ sādhyadharmmavatyeva dharmmiṇi vartate iti sādhyadharmmasyānarthāntarasya sādhanadharmmasvabhāvatā sidhyati |
SA15n1233:994: “tayā ca” vastutastabhdāvatayā sādhanadharmmabhāvamātrānubandhaḥ sādhyadharmmasya sidhyatīti “anvayaniścayaḥ” ‘yatra yatra sādhanadharmmastatra tatra sādhyadharmmaḥ’ ityevaṃrūpo jāyate |
SA15n1233:999: sa ca vastutastabhdāvatayā sidhyatīti tatsiddhyupāyaṃ bādhakapramāṇavṛttiṃ darśayati-“akṣaṇikatve” kṣaṇikaviparyaye sati “artha kriyāvirodhāt” arthasya- kāryasya kriyā- niṣpattistasyā virodhāt “tallakṣaṇaṃ” sā'rthakriyā lakṣaṇaṃ yasya “vastutvasya” arthakriyāsāmarthyātmana,
SA15n1233:1005: tadanayā bādhakapramāṇavṛttyā sādhyadharmmasya vastutaḥ sādhanadharmmasvabhāvatā sidhyati |
SA15n1233:1008: evaṃ svabhāvahetau viparyaye bādhakapramāṇavṛttyā tādātmyasiddhito'nvayaniścayaṃ pratipādya koryahetau pratipādapannāha- “kāryahetau” anvayaniścayaḥ iti prakṛtam |
SA15n1233:1016: na ca kevalaṃ pratyakṣaṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvamasandigdhaṃ sādhayati,
SA15n1233:1019: ṣūpalambhapratyayeṣu dṛśyātmakaṃ sat nopalabdhaṃ bhavati agnyādisāmagrīsannidhānāt prāk tādātmyādisāmagryāmupalabhyamānāyāmupalabhyamānaṃ tatkāryaṃ sidhyati |
SA15n1233:1028: na cāgnīndhanādibhāve niyatasannidheradṛśyātmanaḥ kutaścit dhūmasya bhāvaḥ syāt ityāśaṅkanīyam |
SA15n1233:1033: pratibandhe vā tatkāryatā tatkāraṇatā vā syāt |
SA15n1233:1043: tadanvayavyatirekānuvidhānādeva ca dhūmasya tat kāraṇaṃ kalpeta |
SA15n1233:1045: tadapi tatra kāraṇamastu iti cet; na,
SA15n1233:1051: yato dhūmadarśanāt tanniścayena pravṛttau tadvisaṃvādaḥ syāt |
SA15n1233:1052: nahi sarvvasattvakarmmādhipatyajanitatve'pi jagadvaicitryasya dṛṣṭakāraṇahānitastatkāryadarśanād vā pravṛttānāṃ atatprāptirityalamatiprasaṅgena |
SA15n1233:1053: kiṃrūpaḥ punarasau kāryakāraṇabhāvo'nupalambhasahāyapratyakṣanibandhana ityāha- “tabhdāve bhāvaḥ tadabhāve'bhāvaśca” iti |
SA15n1233:1054: ya eva hi kāraṇābhimatasya bhāve bhāva eva |
SA15n1233:1065: yato nānyayogasteṣāṃ pūrvvarūpaṃ nāśayati vināśahetvayogād vakṣyamāṇakāt |
SA15n1233:1067: nahi teṣu niṣpanneṣvaniṣpanno bhinnahetuko vā tatsvabhāvo yuktsaḥ |
SA15n1233:1068: ayaṃ hi bhedo bhedaheturvā viruddhadharmmādhyāsaḥ kāraṇa bhedaśca tataścet na bhedaḥ,
SA15n1233:1069: anyanimittābhāvāt ekaṃ dravyaṃ viśvaṃ syāt ityādi prasajyeta |
SA15n1233:1071: tataśca pūrvvake vastunī tadavasthe eveti na tayoranyayoge'pi kāryakāraṇarūpatāpattiḥ |
SA15n1233:1073: tadā svabhāvata eva tayoḥ kāryakāraṇarūpatvādanyastabhdāvaḥ kathaṃ na vaiyarthyamanubhavet ? |
SA15n1233:1078: nahi tad arthāntaraṃ svasattāmātreṇa tabduddhī pravartayati |
SA15n1233:1083: na hi yannimito yo'nyatrātabduddhibhāji tabdyavasāyaḥ sa tadanupalakṣaṇe yuktaḥ |
SA15n1233:1089: niruddhayoradhyāhṛtya tatpratyayakalpanāyāṃ ca kalpitaviṣaya eva kāryakāraṇatādhyavasāyaḥ syāt na vastuviṣayaḥ |
SA15n1233:1095: yadā ca kāraṇena janyate tadā kiṃ svakāryasahito janyate,
SA15n1233:1099: yadi svakāryasahitastudubhayoranyata eva bhāvāt parasparamasambandha iti kāryasambandhitā'sya hīyeta |
SA15n1233:1101: tadā kṣaṇikatayā kāraṇasya tameva janayitvā dhvaṃsāt kathaṃ svakāryakrīyā ? |
SA15n1233:1104: atha svakāryaṃ kṛtvā paścājjanyeta tadā'pi svakāryakāle eva vinaṣṭatvād asatastaduttarakālabhāvikāryakāraṇabhāvajananaṃ kutaḥ ? |
SA15n1233:1110: teṣāṃ ca kāraṇatvamekaikāpāye kāryavyatirekataḥ samunnīyata ityāha- “satsvapyanyeṣu” tatsāmagryantarggateṣu “hetuṣu” janakeṣu pratyekaṃ teṣāṃ vyañjanakatvād “asyābhāve” janakatvena nirddhāryamāṇatayā vivakṣitasyābhāve “na bhavati” ityanenānupalambhasya viṣaya uktaḥ |
SA15n1233:1112: tathā cāyamapi tabhdāve bhāvaḥ tadabhāve'bhāvaśca kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ kiṃsādhanaḥ ?
SA15n1233:1114: yastvanupalambhasāpekṣeṇa pratyakṣeṇa sādhyata iti prāguktaḥ so'nupalambhapūrvvakaṃ pratyakṣaṃ sādhanamasyeti anupalambhapratyakṣasādhana iti vaktavyaḥ |
SA15n1233:1115: “tasya” kāryakāraṇabhāvasyānvayavyatirekātmanaḥ “siddhiḥ” niścayo “yathoktābhyāṃ” pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāṃ kāryahetāvanvayaniścaya iti sambandhate |
SA15n1233:1116: nanu cānvayaniścayo nāma kāryahetoḥ sarvvatra kāryasya bhavataḥ svakāraṇasattayā'nugamanamityevamavasāyaḥ tat kathaṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvasiddhirevā'sāvucyate ?
SA15n1233:1118: darśanamātranibandhanaṃ ye tamicchanti tanmataniṣedhārthamasāvevamukta iti darśayannāha- “kāryakāraṇabhāva eva hi” kāryakāraṇabhāve satyeva ‘hiḥ’ yasmāt “arthāntarasya” sādhyād vyatiriktasya,
SA15n1233:1119: yastvavyatiriktaḥ tasya viparyaye bādhakapramāṇavṛttyā tādātmyaniścayādevānvayaniścaya iti pūrvvamuktamevetyarthāntaragrahaṇam |
SA15n1233:1122: ‘yatra nāma kvacid dhūmaḥ tatrāvaśyamagniḥ’ iti niyamena ‘agneḥ tatra bhāvaḥ’ ityevaṃrūpo'nvayaniścayaḥ |
SA15n1233:1123: yastvakāryakāraṇabhāve'pi rasasyārthāntarasya rūpeṇānvayaniścayaḥ sa ekasāmagryadhīnatayā tasya svakāraṇāvyabhicāradvāraka evetyadoṣaḥ |
SA15n1233:1124: atha yadi nāma kāryamagnerdhūmastathāpi kimiti yatrāsau tatrāvaśyamagnirbhavati yataḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvasiddhinibandhano'nvayaniścaya ucyata ityāha-“agneḥ bhāve eva” sattāyāmeva ‘hiḥ’ yasmāt “bhāvaḥ” sattā dhūmasya “kāryatvamiti” |
SA15n1233:1126: yadi hi yatra dhūmastatrāvaśyamagnirnna syāt tadā'gnimantareṇāpyasya bhāvād agnibhāva eva bhāvalakṣaṇaṃ kāryatvaṃ hīyeta |
SA15n1233:1137: yadā hyasavdyavahārasya yathoktānupalabhdivyatiriktaṃ buddhivyapadeśārthakriyāvirahādikaṃ nimittaṃ na bhavatīti sādhyate tadā yathoktānupalabdhimātre'sya vṛttiḥ siddhā bhavati |
SA15n1233:1139: anyathā hi nimittāntarāpekṣāśaṅkāyāṃ satyāmapi yathoktānupalabdhau nāvaśyamasavdyavahārasya bhāva iti kuto'nvayaniścayaḥ syāt ? |
SA15n1233:1140: nimittāntarābhāvastu vistarato vādanyāya ukta iti tata evāvadhāryaḥ |
SA15n1233:1141: athavā savdyavahārasya yannimittamupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptasya sattvam tad asavdyavahāranimittādanyatvāt nimittāntaraṃ tatrānupalabdherabhāva upadarśyate yena pramāṇena tadevamuktam,
SA15n1233:1145: tadevaṃ trayāṇāmapi hetūnāṃ yathāsvaṃ pramāṇenānvayaniścaya uktaḥ |
SA15n1233:1150: samprati trayāṇāmapi hetūnāṃ svasvapramānanibandhanaṃ vyatirekaniścayaṃ pratipādayitukāma āha- “vyatirekaniścayo'pi” na kevalamanvayaniścayo yathāsvaṃ pramāṇanibandhanastayoruktaḥ api tu “vyatirekaniścayo'pi kāryasvabhāvahetvo” ryathāsvaṃ pramāṇanimitta ucyate |
SA15n1233:1153: yāvatadātmaka[tadātmakau hetū kāraṇavyāpakarūpasādhyasya sādhakau] sādhyābhāve cābhāvasiddhistayoḥ |
SA15n1233:1158: kadā punaste anupalabdhī sādhike tasya bhavataḥ ? |
SA15n1233:1159: “kāryakāraṇavyāpyavyāpakabhāvasiddhau” pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvasiddhau satyāṃ kāraṇānupalabdhiḥ kāryahetau sādhyābhāve'bhāvasya sādhikā,
SA15n1233:1161: vyāpyavyāpakabhāvasiddhau satyāṃ vyāpakānupalabdhiḥ svabhāvahetau sādhyābhāve'bhāvasya sādhiketi |
SA15n1233:1162: tadevaṃ bruvatā ubhayatra tādātmyatadutpattilakṣaṇapratibandhaniścayādeva dvayorapyanvayavyatirekayoḥ niścaya iti uktaṃ bhavati |
SA15n1233:1166: yadi kāraṇavyāpakāvupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptau bhavatastadā tadanupalabdhī sādhyābhāve'bhāvaṃ sādhayata iti yāvat |
SA15n1233:1168: ityāha-“uddiṣṭaviṣayasya” uddiṣṭaḥ- kathito viṣayaḥ- ādhāro vaidharmmyadṛṣṭāntalakṣaṇo yasya sādhyābhāve'bhāvasya tasyopadarśane kriyamāṇe |
SA15n1233:1172: yadā'nupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaṃ viṣayaṃ vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntarūpamupādatte tadā'nupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptau tatra kāraṇavyāpakāvapi bhavata iti “anupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptasyaḥ” kāraṇasya vyāpakasya vā “kvacid” viprakṛṣṭe viṣaye sumervvādau “abhāvāsiddheḥ” kathamābhyāṃ sādhyābhāve'bhāvasiddhiḥ syāt,
SA15n1233:1175: ityāha- “anuddiṣṭaviṣayam” anuddiṣṭo viṣayaḥ- vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntarūpo yasmin sādhyābhāve hetvabhāvakhyāpane tat “pratibandhamātrasiddhau” satyāṃ dṛśyaviṣayatāviśeṣaṇamantareṇāpi yasmāt “sidhyati iti” tasmāt “na tatra” anuddiṣṭaviṣaye “vyatirekasādhane” anupalabdhyo “rdṛśyaviṣaya tāviśeṣaṇamapekṣyate” aṅgīkriyate |
SA15n1233:1176: tathā hi-aśeṣapadārthaparigraheṇa sāmānyenāpi bruvato yo yatra pratibaddhasvabhāvaḥ tādātmyatadutpattibhyāṃ sa tadabhāve'vaśyameva na bhavatīti niḥsvabhāvatvā'hetukatvaprasaṅgāt | taduktam-
SA15n1233:1181: tatastatra dṛśyaviṣayatā'pekṣyamāṇānupakārikaiveti na tayā kiñciditi bhāvaḥ |
SA15n1233:1182: “pratibandhamātrasiddhau” ityanena ye pratibandhaṃ hetornna varṇṇayanti kintvadarśanamātrādeva vyatirekamāhusteṣāṃ tadasambhavaṃ vca darśayati |
SA15n1233:1183: tathā hi-asati pratibandhe yadi sarvve sādhyavirahiṇo'rthā dṛśyā bhavanti tadā teṣvanupalabdhasya sādhanasyābhāvaḥ śiṣyet |
SA15n1233:1185: “gatvā gatvā tu tān deśān yadyartho nopalabhyate |
SA15n1233:1187: deśādiviprakarṣitayā tvadṛśyatve satyapi tatra hetāvanupalambhamātrasya sambhavāt sandigdho'sāva'śeṣe sādhyābhāve sādhanābhāvalakṣaṇo vyatirekaḥ tathāvidhasyaiva yatra yatra sādhyābhāvaḥ tatra tatra sādhanābhāva iti vīpsāpadābhyāmabhidhānāt |
SA15n1233:1188: anvayaniścayo'pi prākpratibandhanibandhana eva varṇṇitaḥ tatastenāpi pareṣāṃ darśananibandhanāmanvayasiddhimicchatāmabhāvo'syāpi kathita eva,
SA15n1233:1190: aśeṣadeśādiviṣayasya ca sādhyānugamasya yatra yatra hetuḥ tatra tatra sādhyam iti vīpsayā pratipādanāt |
SA15n1233:1191: na ca katipayadeśādau sādhanadharmmasya sādhyadharmmeṇa sahabhāvasya bhūyo darśane'pi vyāptiḥ sidhyati,
SA15n1233:1192: asati pratibandhe kvacid bahulaṃ tathādṛṣṭānāmapyanyāthātvasyāpi sambhavāt,
SA15n1233:1197: ityāha “upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptād” vidyamānopalambhapratyayāntarād dṛśyasvabhāvācca “sataḥ” vidyamānāt sādhyābhāvarūpād “anupalambhasya” tadviviktopalambhātmano yo'bhāvaḥ sato yadgrāhakaṃ pratyakṣaṃ tabhdāvalakṣaṇastasya “darśanaṃ” darśyate- pratyāyyate'neneti darśanam upadarśakaṃ pramāṇaṃ tadātmako'nupalabdhau vyatirekaniścayaḥ |
SA15n1233:1199: yadi hi sannihitānyopalambhapratyayo dṛśyasvabhāvo bhāvo vidyamāno'pi nopalabhyeta kathamasau dṛśyasvabhāvaḥ syāt ? |
SA15n1233:1200: yo hi satsvanyeṣūpalambhapratyayeṣu san pratyakṣa eva bhavati sa eva dṛśyasvabhāva ākhyāyate |
SA15n1233:1204: prayogaḥ-yad yanmātranimittaṃ tatsmin sati niyamena bhavati |
SA15n1233:1206: yathoktopalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptatāmātranimittaṃ ca sati vastuni tathāvidhe pratyakṣamiti svabhāvahetuḥ |
SA15n1233:1212: tathā hi-kāraṇavyāpakayorabhāvaḥ kāryavyāpyābhāvābhyāmavaśyamanvitaḥ kāryavyāpyābhāvavyatireke ca tabhdāvalakṣaṇe'vaśyaṃ vyatiricyate kāraṇavyāpakayorbhāvāt |
SA15n1233:1215: tadetāvatā granthena “pakṣadharmmastadaṃśena vyāpto hetuḥ” iti vyākhyātam |
SA15n1233:1216: adhunā “tridhaiva saḥ” ityetad vyākhyātumāha- “etallakṣaṇaḥ” ‘pakṣadharmmaḥ san yastadaṃśena vyāpto hetuḥ’ ityetallakṣaṇaṃ yasya sa etallakṣaṇaḥ |
SA15n1233:1220: tān hetūna svena svena nāmnā kīrttayati- “svabhāvaḥ kāryam anupalabdhiśceti” |
SA15n1233:1229: ityāśaṅkaya trividhahetuvyatiriktānāmarthānāṃ hetvābhāsatayā hetuviruddhayā vyāptestriṣveva hetutvaṃ niyataṃ bhavatiti hetvābhāsatāṃ pramāṇavatīṃ tadvyatirekiṇāṃ darśayannāha- “atraiva” svabhāvakāryā'nupalabdhyākhye “trividhahetau avinābhāvasya niyamāditi” trividhahetuvyatirikteṣvartheṣvavinābhāvā'bhāvādityarthaḥ |
SA15n1233:1230: tataścāvinābhāvavikalatvāt svabhāvakāryānupalabdhivyatirekiṇo'rthā hetvābhāsāḥ prameyatvādivat ityuktaṃ bhavati |
SA15n1233:1236: ityata āha- “yathoktā vyāptiḥ vyāpakasya”- tatkāraṇatayā tabhdāvatayā ca |
SA15n1233:1237: yatra tadvayāpyaṃ kāryaṃ svabhāvo vā sannihitastatra bhāva eva |
SA15n1233:1239: yatra tatkāraṇasvabhāvākhyaṃ vyāpakaṃ sannihitaṃ tatraiva dharmmiṇi na tadabhāve'pi bhāva iti yā vyāpakavyāpyadharmmatayā vyāptiruktā sā “yathoktā vyāptiravinābhāvaḥ” |
SA15n1233:1249: yathā ca trividhād hetoranyatrāvinābhāvo nāsti tathā prāgevoktam |
SA15n1233:1252: anupalabdherapyanyad yathoktāyāḥ anupalabdhimātramupalabdhirvvā pratiṣedhyasya tadanyasyāpi viruddhasyāviruddhasya vā |
SA15n1233:1253: tatrārthāntaram yadyanantarakāryaṃ tasyārvāgdarśibhiḥ itaravivekena lakṣayitumaśakyatvāt aliṅgatvam |
SA15n1233:1254: kāryadarśanāt vivekāvasāye'pi sādhyasidyuttarakālabhāvī pakṣadharmmatāvasāyo'nvayānugamanaṃ ca vyarthaṃ |
SA15n1233:1263: nanu sā'pi naivāsati pratibandhe yuktā viśeṣābhāvena sarvvataḥ sarvvapratītiprasaṅgāt ityuktatvāt |
SA15n1233:1265: yathā bhūtasaṃkṣobhaḥ paścātkālabhāvino varṣasyeti hetudharmmānumānena kāryaliṅgajaiva kalpayitavyā |
SA15n1233:1271: kintu sa virodhastabhdāve satyanyānupalambhādeva siddha iti taddvāreṇānupalabdhireva prayuktā bhavati |
SA15n1233:1275: na cāparaḥ prakāraḥ sambhavatīti nāvinābhāvo'nyatra vidyata iti |
